description:
Longest episode yet homeboy! Almost 3 hours of Santos the man dropping mad knowledge on flat earth, Chakras, spirituality, religion and aliens. You name it we talked about it. Episode  #278 is now out at brokensimualtion.com and every podcast app. #look into it #reposted • @caesar.luvzlife Reposted from @foundconscious All i’m going to say is watch this video! It’s on The Tinfoil Hat Podcast (YouTube) and the speaker is Santos Bonacci - one of the best podcast episodes i have watched, mind opening. For some, a lot of what is said may go over the head, but check out his other work on syncretism.
For more information specifically about this, your Birth cirtificate, maritime law, the vatican linguistic deceptions, check out a guy named Romley Stewart who runs a YouTube channel named “Justinian Deception” amazing channel... caution... it will blow your mind.
@tinfoilhatcast @samtripoli @santosbonacci
